action-handle-import-request-interwiki: handle remote interwiki prefixes for import requests
echo-category-title-importdump-request-c: Comment added to an import request
echo-category-title-importdump-request-s: Status updated for an import request
echo-pref-tooltip-importdump-request-com: Notify me when there is a comment on an import request that I have participated on.
echo-pref-tooltip-importdump-request-sta: Notify me when the status is updated for an import request that I have participated on.
importdump-comment-success: Comment successfully added to this request.
importdump-desc: An extension designed to automate user import requests.
importdump-duplicate-comment: Unable to resubmit the same comment as your previous request.
importdump-duplicate-request: Unable to submit this request. It is too similar to an already open request.
importdump-help-reason: Please describe in detail the reason you are making this import request.
importdump-help-source: Enter the full URL of the source wiki (where you are importing from).
importdump-help-target: This must be a valid database name.
importdump-help-upload-file: Only XML files are permitted. If your XML file is in a compressed archive, please extract it before attempting to upload.
importdump-help-upload-file-url: Only uncompressed XML files are permitted.
importdump-import-failed-comment: There was an error while importing the provided XML.
importdump-info-interwiki: Add an interwiki prefix to the local interwiki table of $1 with the below fields. Please ensure the values are correct before submitting.
importdump-info-no-file-found: No file was found at $1. It may have already been deleted.
importdump-info-no-interwiki-prefix: No interwiki prefix exists on the target wiki ($1), which is pointing to the source wiki ($2). It is recommended that you add one before continuing.
importdump-info-request-private: This request is marked as private. It is not publicly viewable.
importdump-info-requester-blocked: The requester ($1) has been blocked on this wiki ($2).
importdump-info-requester-locked: The requester ($1) has been locked. This request should be declined.
importdump-interwiki-failed: Interwiki prefix was not added to $1. It might already be present, or another error occured.
importdump-invalid-interwiki-url: The provided interwiki URL is not valid.
importdump-invalid-target: The provided target is not a valid database name.
importdump-label-interwiki-prefix: Enter the prefix to add to the wiki's local interwiki table:
importdump-label-interwiki-url: Enter the URL to add to the wiki's local interwiki table (e.g. $1):
importdump-label-lock: Lock this request from being edited or from comments being added to it?
importdump-label-status-updated-comment: Optional additional comment to add to this request:
importdump-label-update-status: Set the status of this request to:
importdump-log-header: This is a log of all import requests and status updates.
importdump-notcentral-text: Import requests are disabled on this wiki. Please request an import from the central wiki.
importdump-notification-body-new-request:
A new import request was received.
Reason given: $1
Requester: $2
Target Database Name: $3
importdump-notloggedin: Please login to request an import.
importdump-private: You do not have permission to view this request as it is marked as private.
importdump-request-locked: This request has been locked. It can not be edited, and no comments can be added to it.
importdump-status-conflict: Could not update the status of this import request because a conflict has been detected. It may have already been started or has already been completed.
importdump-status-updated-success: Status successfully updated for this request.
importdump-success: Your import request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed as soon as possible.
importdump-success-locked: This request has been successfully locked. It can no longer be edited and comments cannot be added to it.
importdump-success-private: This request has been successfully marked as private. It is no longer publicly viewable.
importdump-success-public: This request has been successfully marked as public. It is now publicly viewable.
importdump-success-unlocked: This request has been successfully unlocked.
importdumpprivate-log-header: This is a log of all import requests and status updates for requests with targets that are private wikis.
logentry-importdump-interwiki: $1 {{GENDER:$2|added}} interwiki prefix '$4' to $5 for import request $6.
logentry-importdumpprivate-interwiki: $1 {{GENDER:$2|updated}} interwiki prefix '$4' to $5 for private import request $6.
logentry-importdumpprivate-request: $1 {{GENDER:$2|requested}} an import for private wiki $4 in $5.
logentry-importdumpprivate-started: $1 {{GENDER:$2|started}} an import for private wiki $4 in $5.
logentry-importdumpprivate-statusupdate: $1 {{GENDER:$2|updated}} status of private import request $4 to '$5'.
requestimportqueue-header-info: You can use this form to search through import requests. Use the parameters below to refine your search.
right-handle-import-request-interwiki: Handle remote interwiki prefixes for import requests
